title: Job Openings at Prime Pharmacy
content:
Prime Pharmacy is a Pharmaceutical company with superstores in all of its branches. We're a one-stop shop for all your medical and groceries needs. Currently, we have three branches that are currently functional and operational 24/7. The Asokoro Garki branch is the head branch while the other branches are located in Gwarimpa and Kubwa respectively.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Procurement Officer

Job Location: Area 11 Garki, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Estimate and establish cost parameters and budgets for purchases.
	Create and maintain good relationships with vendors/suppliers.
	Make professional decisions in a fast-paced environment.
	Negotiate the best deal for pricing and supply contracts.
	Ensure that the products and supplies are high quality.
	Maintain records of purchases, pricing, and other important data.
	Review and analyze all vendors/suppliers, supply, and price options.
	Develop plans for purchasing equipment, services, and supplies.
	Maintain and update a list of suppliers and their qualifications, delivery times, and potential future development.
	Work with team members and procurement manager to complete duties as needed.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: primepharmacyjobs@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Driver 

Job Location: Area 11 Garki, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Driving the staff to the market for purchase.
	Create and maintain good relationships with staff.
	Any other job can be assigned to you by your supervisor.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: primepharmacyjobs@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

3.) Sales Executive

Job Location: Area 11 Garki, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Sales Assistants are expected to work on store sales floors providing assistance directly to customers.
	They must be knowledgeable of the store layout, inventory and company policies in order to provide accurate information to shoppers.
	Sales Assistants help to locate product for customers, process transactions and keep the sales floor organized and well-stocked.


Job Responsibilities
Your responsibilities while in this role include but are not limited to:


	Greeting customers who enter the shop.
	Assisting shoppers to find the goods and products they are looking for.
	Stocking shelves with merchandise.
	Bagging of purchased items for customers.
	Attaching price tags to goods on the shelves. And update prices on price tags.
	Scan and compute customer purchase on the computer. Print and issue receipts to customer.
	Ensure customers get all goods paid for are bagged accordingly
	Providing customers with advice on the right products for them
	Reporting discrepancies and problems to the supervisor.
	Monitor and manage products on the shelf to ensure their purchase before expiration.
	Report challenges with customers purchases, payment, card defect to the supervisor.
	And any other responsibilities as suggested by your superior.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: primepharmacyjobs@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Sales Executive Job at ESV Global Consults
content:
ESV Global Consults is a premier human resource consulting firm dedicated to empowering organizations to achieve their full potential. With a passion for people and a commitment to excellence, we provide innovative HR solutions that drive business success. Our team of experienced HR professionals brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table, with a proven track record of delivering tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients. From recruitment and talent management to organizational development and change management, we offer a comprehensive range of services designed to optimize your workforce and drive business results.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



At ESV Global Consults we believe that people are the heart of every organization, and that investing in your employees is the key to unlocking long-term success. That's why we're dedicated to helping you build a high-performing team that's engaged, motivated, and equipped to drive your business forward.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking dynamic and results-oriented Sales Executive with 3-6 years of proven sales experience, including a minimum of 2 years within the FMCG industry.
	The ideal candidates will play a pivotal role in driving sales growth by promoting and selling our premium cashew products to a diverse clientele.
	This position demands exceptional communication skills, a strategic sales mindset, and a demonstrated ability to cultivate and sustain strong customer relationships.
	If you have a track record of exceeding sales targets, a passion for delivering exceptional customer experiences, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we invite you to join our team and contribute to the continued success of our brand.


Key Responsibilities
Sales and Revenue Generation:


	Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets.
	Identify new sales opportunities within assigned territories.
	Ensure product availability in retail outlets, supermarkets, or distributor warehouses.


Market Expansion & Promotions:


	Expand customer base by onboarding new distributors, retailers, or other clients.
	Open new sales territories and penetrate underserved markets.
	Conduct regular store visits to identify new opportunities
	Execute promotional activities, such as product sampling or discounts.


Customer Relationship Management:


	Build and maintain strong relationships with existing stores and key accounts.
	Address customer complaints and resolve issues promptly.
	Provide after-sales support like sales optimization


Merchandising and Brand Visibility:


	Ensure proper placement and display of products in stores are done by in-store merchandisers.
	Participate in promotional campaigns and in-store branding/activations.
	Monitor competitor activities and provide feedback to the team.
	Monitor promotions and recommend strategies needed for business growth.


Reporting and Analysis


	Prepare and submit sales reports, sales target breakdown and market feedback.
	Analyse sales performance and recommend strategies for improvement.
	Monitor stock levels and ensure timely replenishment in stores.


Territory Management:


	Manage a designated sales territory, ensuring effective coverage.
	Plan daily/weekly routes to maximize time and efforts.
	Optimize the use of resources to cover territory effectively.


Compliance and Documentation:


	Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements.
	Maintain accurate records of sales, invoices, and client communications.


Requirements


	Minimum of Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
	3-6 years of proven experience as a Sales Executive with at least 2 years of solid experience in the FMCG industry.
	Solid understanding of sales techniques and pipeline management.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software.
	Strong negotiation and persuasion skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving business growth.


Benefits


	Competitive salary (N150,000 - N250,000 Monthly) with exclusive logistics & data allowance.
	Negotiable commission.
	Opportunity for career growth in a thriving industry.


Method of Application
Interested candidates should send their CV to: Esvconsult25@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
